entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,365Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 8

Summary: A Teen Wolf Rewrite. This work is an attempt at fixing the things that annoy me about teen wolf and creating an actual timeline.In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers.

entry.title: An Ordinary Day in May
entry.summary:
Author: Thelargebluemedicalvolume

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,177Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: After wrapping up an important case, Stiles earns a few extra days off. On a whim, he decides to return home to Beacon Hills to visit his father for a relaxing break. But when he runs into a panicked teenage boy in the middle of the woods, he is thrust back into an adventure reminiscent of the old days. This time however, he’s offering comfort and guidance to Eli through his experience with the supernatural and with being an anxious teenager, all while doing his best not to think about Eli's dad as anything more than that.

Author: Hashless

Summary: The scent of sun, sweat, joy, cheap laundry detergent, and something sweet that was inextricably Stiles, hit him like a truck going a hundred miles per hour. Relief washed over the anxiousness of the last few days, easing the tension in his shoulders like it had never existed. His animalistic side purred at the feel of friend, pack, family. He wasn’t dreaming, his arms were full of Stiles. Finally. (Or five times Derek visits Stiles in college, and gets dragged into his wacky plans, thinking they are just friends—which is fine because he’ll never want more anyway—and the one time he finally understands his mistake. entry.title: Dying In Love
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,738Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 46

Summary: After dropping out of his FBI internship, Stiles returned to Beacon Hills, struggling to outgrow the version of himself high school forced him to become. He wasn't sure what he was doing with his life, but he kept busy among the shelves at The Reading Nook, letting the quiet and routine distract him from the memories. And then Derek Hale walked in. Derek being in his life again stirred a hunger inside Stiles, a wanting that consumed him whole. It left him breathless, filled with a love so fierce it clawed at his chest and threatened to tear him apart inside. —Weekly Updates—

entry.title: Full Moons and Family Drama
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,447Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 211

Summary: Talia Hale survives the Hale Fire, along with Laura, Derek, Peter, and Cora. It's been roughly ten years since the events of that night, and to say that it left scars would be an understatement. Desperate to bring her Pack back to its old strength, Talia will not stop pushing her children and brother to settle down and have kids of their own. For this year's Cold Moon, Peter finally brings someone home. Stiles is not at all what Talia was expecting. He's far too young for Peter, he's human, and worst of all a man. (No biological children to carry on the Pack). He also doesn't give a shit what Talia says about him. His mere presence is enough to have her melting down, and it's bad for the simmering tension between her and the rest of the Pack. Unfortunately, everyone else likes him. Derek might like him more than the rest. A little too much. Aw hell, he has a crush on his uncle's boyfriend. Or: Five times Peter brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run + One time Derek did. (Updates every other Tuesday)

entry.title: Deny and Obey
entry.summary:
Author: mee4ever

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,279Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 25

Summary: “You need an anchor,” Derek tells him when Stiles lies on his back, panting, naked, on the forest floor.Stiles snorts. Pain and starvation are the only two things that have worked at all, but neither keeps him human for long. “No shit, asshole.” Not like he’s tried to find something to hold onto his humanity every time he’s managed to drag himself back into human form. Stiles sucks in a breath and braces when he feels himself slipping. Then Derek digs his claws into his thigh. Stiles screams murder but Derek ignores him. “Pain,” he says as he hovers over Stiles while kneeling beside him, “isn’t the best anchor, but at least it is one.”  Or the one where Derek turns Stiles to save his life, and they leave Beacon hills to figure it all out, but they're shit at communicating.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,121Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 176

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.
